original_title: Celebration of the Tercentenary of the Founding of The Premier Grand Lodge
overview: THE UNITED GRAND LODGE OF ENGLAND CELEBRATED ITS EPIC TERCENTENARY CELEBRATION AT THE ROYAL ALBERT HALL IN 2017.  Over 4,000 Freemasons from Provinces and Districts were joined by representatives from over 130 sovereign Grand Lodges from around the world to mark 300 years since the founding of the worldâ€™s first Grand Lodge for Freemasons.  The audience witnessed a theatrical extravaganza which embraced the rich history and heritage of Freemasonry and featured a cast of renowned actors including Sir Derek Jacobi, Samantha Bond and Sanjeev Bhaskar.
title: Celebration of the Tercentenary of the Founding of The Premier Grand Lodge
